description:
Fixes NPAPITester ui tests. I was trying to diagnose failing ui tests
and with page heap enabled these tests consistenly crashed on me. I've
no idea about this code, but this change fixed it. As far as I can
tell in some cases Send deletes the NPObjectProxy, so that any code
that attempts to access the proxy after the Send may crash.

BUG=none
TEST=none


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=7452

messages.text:
http://codereview.chromium.org/16418/diff/1/2
File chrome/plugin/npobject_proxy.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/16418/diff/1/2#newcode186
Line 186: proxy = NULL;
We should just set proxy to NULL in the destructor? It would reduce the number of changes to this file.
In all the places I'm setting proxy to null proxy is declared in the fuction. We don't have to set proxy to NULL, I just figured it would make it easier to catch problems like this in the future.

subject: Fixes NPAPITester ui tests. I was trying to diagnose failing ui tests...
